name: More Robots!
description:
An idle game meant for mobile, More Robots is a game where you play as a lowly, freelance mechanic building robots on commission.

THIS IS A PROTOTYPE - By no means is this a finished game! We want a lot more included and polished on it.

This was made for our Year 2, Semester 1 Game Mechanics class at Sheridan College in the Honours Bachelor of Game Design program! Our instructor is Mike Brown. The task was first to make a game based around an economy system, with at least 2 economies, then in the next assignment we took it further with the requirement of more polished art and UI.

THE TEAM:

Selina Muriel (me): Gameplay Design, UX and UI Design, All art assets, Sound Design

Kyle Budge: Programming, Gameplay, UX and UI design, Sound Design

Bruce McCormack: Programming, Gameplay and UX design

Paolo DiFillipo: Gameplay Design, UI Design/Management
